DocAttribute.Name: CoordinateSpaceDimension
DocAttribute.Documentation: The integer dimension count of the coordinate space modeled in a geometric representation context.

DocAttribute.Name: Precision
DocAttribute.Documentation: Value of the model precision for geometric models. It is a double value (REAL), typically in 1E-5 to 1E-8 range, that indicates the tolerance under which two given points are still assumed to be identical. The value can be used e.g. to sets the maximum distance from an edge curve to the underlying face surface in brep models.

DocAttribute.Name: WorldCoordinateSystem
DocAttribute.Documentation: Establishment of the engineering coordinate system (often referred to as the world coordinate system in CAD) for all representation contexts used by the project. > NOTE  It can be used to provide better numeric stability if the placement of the building(s) is far away from the origin. In most cases however it would be set to origin: (0.,0.,0.) and directions x(1.,0.,0.), y(0.,1.,0.), z(0.,0.,1.).

DocAttribute.Name: TrueNorth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Direction of the true north, or geographic northing direction, relative to the underlying project coordinate system. It is given by a 2 dimensional direction within the xy-plane of the project coordinate system. If not present, it defaults to 0. 1., meaning that the positive Y axis of the project coordinate system equals the geographic northing direction.

DocAttribute.Name: HasSubContexts

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _TrueNorth_ direction, if provided, shall be a two-dimensional direction.
